Auto Generated Documentations using Docstrings¶

class k_means.KMeans(K)[source]¶

A class which encapsulates several functionalities which provide the K-Means clustering algorithm.

alternating_bins_initialisation(pixel_data, a=None, b=None)[source]¶

Initialise clusters by alternating the bins to which the vectors are assigned.

Parameters:
  • pixel_data (list[list[int]]) – The data that is divded into clusters.
  • a (int) – The lower bound of the interval in the pixel_data. If its set to None, then the value is 0.
  • b (int) – The upper bound of the interval in pixel_data. If is None then it is set to the length of pixel_data.
Return type:

defaultdict
calculate_cb_vecs(clusters)[source]¶

Setup and calculate codebook vectors

Parameters:clusters (defaultdict) – The clusters in which the codebook vectors are calculated.
Return type:array(array(int))
fix(pixel_data)[source]¶

Runs the K-means algorithm.

Parameters:pixel_data (array(array(int))) – A set of vectors of the data which is clustered.
get_cb_vectors()[source]¶

Get the codebook vectors.

Return type:array(array(int))
